name: Worm Lair
description:
Survive as long as possible on this endless arena shooter.

You can use WASD to move the character and aim/shoot with the mouse.

----------

Developed for the Game Creator's Club at Lusofona University. This month, the theme was "Single Screen Game". I wasn't going to enter this month because I'm really late with other work, but a student of mine decided to push me, and as a result I built this completely unbalanced monstrosity in his honor (with his face).

Full source code available at https://github.com/DiogoDeAndrade/WormLair
